desc: Acorn Kids offers kids hats and baby hats designed in Australia. From children's beanies through to baby beanies plus baby mittens and kids mittens and scarves. As well as kids sun hats, baby sun hats and kids swim hats, UPF50+ sun hats for kids. Proudly fair trade and ethically handmade hats.

layout.text: Hats and Accessories for Little People.
